In Chile, a powerful 7.6 earthquake rocks the north forcing evacuations.
This, just a day after a deadly 8.2 tremor in the same region.
In Lebanon, the number of Syrian refugees tops one million.
Lufthansa pilots in Germany continue to strike over benefits for early retirement,...
In Australia, the Australian and Malaysian prime ministers...
...promise to do everything possible to find missing Malaysia Airlines Flight MH370.
And finally from Italy, Britain's Queen Elizabeth and husband the Duke of Edinburgh...
...arrive to meet the Italian president and Pope Francis.
